charts.mentionsOverTimeTooltip: Shows the frequency of mentions over a period of time
charts.clickDataPoint: Click on any data point to see mentions on that date
charts.sentimentOverTimeTooltip: Displays how sentiment trends have changed over the selected time period
charts.sentimentTrendsTooltip: Tracks the evolution of positive, negative, and neutral sentiment over time
charts.clickDataPointSentiment: Click on any data point to filter by date and sentiment type
charts.platformDistributionTooltip: Shows how mentions are distributed across different platforms and sources
charts.clickPlatformBar: Click on any bar to see mentions for that platform
charts.countryDistributionTooltip: Visualizes how mentions are distributed across different countries
charts.clickCountryBar: Click on any bar to see mentions for that country
charts.geographicalDistributionTooltip: Displays mention distribution and sentiment on a world map
charts.themeAnalysisTooltip: Identifies and quantifies the main themes and topics in the mentions
charts.emotionalAnalysisTooltip: Analyzes the emotional content beyond basic sentiment, including joy, anger, fear, etc.
charts.sentimentBySourceTooltip: Shows the distribution of positive, neutral, and negative sentiments across different sources
charts.influencerAnalysisTooltip: Identifies key influencers and their impact on the sentiment
charts.entityRelationshipTooltip: Visualizes connections between entities and their associated sentiment
charts.emotionalSpectrumTooltip: Provides a detailed breakdown of emotions detected in mentions
charts.contextualSentimentTooltip: Analyzes how sentiment changes in different contexts
charts.comparisonReportTooltip: Compares sentiment and mentions between two time periods or entities
charts.eventAnalysisTooltip: Shows how specific events impact sentiment over time
charts.autoSummaryTooltip: Provides an AI-generated summary of key findings and insights
charts.sentimentDataTableTooltip: Displays detailed sentiment data in a sortable and filterable table
charts.platformBarChartTooltip: Shows distribution of mentions across platforms
charts.countryBarChartTooltip: Shows distribution of mentions by country
charts.tryAdjustingFilter: Try adjusting the minimum mentions filter or check if data is loading correctly.

contextualSentiment.title: Contextual Sentiment Analysis
contextualSentiment.infoTooltip: See how sentiment changes when entities are mentioned together vs. individually
contextualSentiment.sentimentShiftWhenEntitiesAreMentionedTo: Sentiment Shift When Entities Are Mentioned Together

entityRelationship.title: Entity Relationship Network
entityRelationship.noEntitiesFound: No entities found with the current filter settings. Try decreasing the threshold.

eventAnalysis.title: Event-Based Sentiment Analysis
eventAnalysis.noEventsFound: No events found in the data
eventAnalysis.noEventsDescription: There are no significant events detected in the current data set. Try changing your filters or adding more data.

autoSummary.title: AI-Generated Sentiment Summary
autoSummary.overallSummary: Analysis of {{count}} content items reveals an overall {{trend}} sentiment trend with an average score of {{score}}. Sentiment distribution shows {{positive}}% positive, {{neutral}}% neutral, and {{negative}}% negative across all sources and platforms.

trends.positiveAction: Identify elements contributing to this improvement for future strategies.
trends.negativeAction: Consider immediate corrective actions to address this decline.

platforms.positiveDescription: Content on {{platform}} demonstrates the highest average sentiment ({{score}}) among all analyzed platforms.
platforms.negativeDescription: Content on {{platform}} demonstrates the lowest average sentiment ({{score}}) among all analyzed platforms.

keyTrends.frequencyDescription: The term "{{word}}" appears {{count}} times with predominantly {{sentiment}} sentiment ({{score}}).

themes.positiveAssociation: The term "{{word}}" is associated with positive sentiment in {{positive}} of {{total}} mentions.
themes.negativeAssociation: The term "{{word}}" is associated with negative sentiment in {{negative}} of {{total}} mentions.

insights.strongPositiveDesc: The high percentage of positive content ({{percentage}}%) indicates favorable perception. Capitalize on this positive momentum in future communications.
insights.significantNegativeDesc: The high negative sentiment ({{percentage}}%) suggests areas for improvement. Address the negative themes identified in this analysis.
insights.platformDiscrepancyDesc: There is a significant difference in sentiment across platforms, with {{platform}} showing the greatest variance. Consider platform-specific content strategies to address these differences.
insights.strongTermDesc: The term "{{term}}" consistently generates positive sentiment ({{score}}). Consider emphasizing this theme in future communications.
insights.negativeTermDesc: The term "{{term}}" consistently generates negative sentiment ({{score}}). Consider addressing concerns related to this theme.
insights.sentimentTrendDesc: Recent data shows a {{direction}} sentiment trend over the past days. {{action}}
insights.stableTrendDesc: Sentiment has remained relatively stable throughout the recent period. This stability provides a solid foundation for consistent messaging.

recentChanges.title: Recent Sentiment {{change}}
recentChanges.description: Sentiment {{change}} by {{points}} points from the previous period.

sentimentTable.infoTooltip: Detailed view of mentions, including content, sentiment score, source, and date
sentimentTable.author: Author

emotionalSpectrum.title: Emotional Spectrum Analysis
emotionalSpectrum.infoTooltip: This analysis identifies specific emotions beyond just positive/negative sentiment, such as joy, sadness, fear, anger, surprise, anticipation, trust, and disgust
emotionalSpectrum.noContentWithSignificantEmotions: No content found with significant emotions

app.exploreDeepInsights: Explore deeper insights with our advanced natural language processing and artificial intelligence features
app.aiPoweredAdvancedAnalysis: AI-powered advanced analysis for deeper understanding of sentiment data

sentimentData.title: Sentiment Data Analysis
sentimentData.description: Comprehensive view of sentiment data across various sources, platforms, and time periods.
sentimentData.dataOverviewText: This table displays sentiment analysis data from various sources including news papers, TV channels, and social media platforms. The sentiment is categorized as positive, negative, or neutral based on content analysis.
sentimentData.usageGuideText: Use the search bar to filter data by content, author, source, or platform. Click on column headers to sort the data. Adjust rows per page using the pagination controls at the bottom.
sentimentData.dataSourceText: This dashboard integrates sentiment analysis results from multiple platforms and sources including social media, news outlets, and online publications. The data is continuously monitored and updated to provide the most current sentiment insights.

comparisonReport.title: Sentiment Analysis Comparison Report
comparisonReport.errorLoading: Failed to load comparison data. Please check that both CSV files exist and are accessible.
comparisonReport.basedOnSentimentLabels: Based on positive, neutral, and negative sentiment labels
comparisonReport.newEntriesInfo: These are entries found in the new dataset that don't exist in the old dataset, based on ID matching
comparisonReport.noNewEntries: No new entries found in the dataset.

target.title: Target Individual Configuration
target.subtitle: Configure the target individual and their name variations for sentiment analysis
target.nameDescription: This is the primary name that will be used to identify the target individual across all data sources.
target.variationsDescription: Add different variations of the target individual's name to improve data collection accuracy.
target.emptyVariationsMessage: No variations added yet. Click 'Add Variation' to add one.
